name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Tools Engineer with over 13 years of expertise in delivering high-performance applications across diverse industries, including healthcare and finance. Proficient in **C#**, **Python**, and automation strategies to enhance user experience and streamline game development processes. Strong background in **CI/CD** practices with tools such as **Jenkins** and **Gitlab CI**, leveraging automation to ensure efficient delivery cycles. 

Experienced in frontend and backend technologies, including hands-on development with **React**, **Next.js**, and **Node.js**, along with a solid foundation in **Unity** for game development. 

Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, fostering collaboration in cross-functional teams. Adept at building user-centric solutions, focusing on automation and real-time processing, while ensuring compliance with industry standards.
